mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply(replyno, reviewno, memno, reply, cdate, cname) VALUES (reply_seq.nextval, #{reviewno}, #{memno}, #{reply}, sysdate, #{cname})
mapper.select: SELECT replyno, reviewno, memno, reply, cdate, cname FROM reply ORDER BY replyno DESC
SELECT replyno, reviewno, memno, reply, cdate, cname FROM reply WHERE reviewno = #{reviewno} ORDER BY replyno DESC
SELECT replyno, reviewno, memno, reply, cdate, cname FROM reply WHERE replyno=#{replyno}
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET reply=#{reply} WHERE replyno=#{replyno}
